source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenic, aerial shot of a vast, misty lake surrounded by mountains at either sunrise or sunset. The sun peeks over the mountain range, casting a warm, golden light and dramatic rays through the haze. Small, tree-covered islands dot the calm, reflective water, creating a serene and majestic atmosphere.

The camera slowly tilts upward, gradually revealing the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption:
This is a scenic, aerial shot of a vast, misty lake surrounded by mountains at either sunrise or sunset. The sun peeks over the mountain range, casting a warm, golden light and dramatic rays through the haze. Small, tree-covered islands dot the calm, reflective water, creating a serene and majestic atmosphere.

The camera slowly tilts upward, gradually revealing the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of kayakers paddles across the lake, creating ripples in the otherwise calm water, as the camera slowly tilts upward to reveal the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic, aerial shot of a vast, misty lake surrounded by mountains at either sunrise or sunset. The sun peeks over the mountain range, casting a warm, golden light and dramatic rays through the haze. Small, tree-covered islands dot the calm, reflective water, creating a serene and majestic atmosphere. A group of kayakers paddles across the lake, creating ripples in the otherwise calm water. The camera slowly tilts upward, gradually revealing the full expanse of the mountain range and the glowing sky.
